page.title: 06Water Treatment
page.content: Some scientists reckon that adding fluoride to the water supply can be harmful to elderly people's bones and organs.Other people think that it is the best way to strengthen children's teeth. In places where fluoride is added to the water supply children's teeth are much healthier. In Birmingham where it has been put in the water for the last 20-25 years, the local dental hospital has to find its patients from outside the area, because so few children in Birmingham have dental disease. Another problem for the water authority is caused by farmers who spray their crops with chemicals which soak into the ground when it rains. They eventually end up in our water supply and may affect our health. Big filter machines could be built to remove the impurities, but they would be expensive to install.
